titleStmt.title: Articles for the due execution of the statutes of apparell, and for the reformation of the outragious excesse thereof, growen of late time within the realme: deuysed vpon the Quenes Maiesties commaundement, by aduise of her counsell, the .vi. of May. Anno.M D LXII.
Proclamations. 1562-05-06
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Powles Churchyarde, by Rycharde Iugge and Iohn Cawood: printers to the Quenes Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: At foot of sheet 3: Cum priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis.
Sheet 1, line 1 of text ends "made"; sheet 2, last complete line ends "meete".
Identified as STC 7945 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
